name: Karim
title: Token design advisor, angel investor, and DeFi degen
bio:
Welcome, I'm Karim.

atm I'm building DeFi products and experimenting with vibecoding.

In the past I have:
- Contributed to Messari Research (a research and data firm in the crypto industry).
- Worked at Outlier Ventures (an early stage crypto investor and accelerator) where I was a token designer for 2 years. This entailed advising early stage crypto protocols on incentive design, product, and token economics.
- Done some angel investing and advisory.

My current passion is building in DeFi, where I embrace the pseudonymous nature of the culture. I have so far:
- Led a permissionless leverage protocol which garned over $5m in pre-deposits, and generated over $250k in protocol revenue within 2 weeks of launching.
- Won 2 hackathons in first place, earning over $80k in prize money (which i quickly and unsuccessfully invested in trying to grow those products).
- Built multiple iterations of an economic game that uses MEV to bootstrap a prize pool, which has done over $1.3 in game volume.
- Strategised and executed DeFi liquidity strategies to grow product and token liquidity for different protocols.

I am still yield farming, advising, and building in DeFi.

experience.title: Token Designer
experience.description: Advised early stage crypto protocols on incentive design, product, and token economics

experience.title: DeFi Builder
experience.description: Building permissionless protocols, winning hackathons, and experimenting with MEV-based economic games
